org.opendaylight.controller.switchmanager.internal

Interface IControllerProperties

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControllerProperties

    public interface IControllerProperties
    The class ControllerProperties is a global store for controller properties. Use this api to store/retrieve properties that are container independent. This is visible only to switch manager. Hence its a part of switch manager internal bundle.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Property> getControllerProperties()
      Return all the global properties of the controller

      Return a specific property of the controller given the property name
